testsuite.name: matpat.carina.demo.WeatherAPITest

testcase.name: testGetWeather

failure.message:
2 expectations failed. Expected status code <200> but was <401>.
Expected status line a string containing "OK" doesn't match actual status line "HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized".
